name: Charon: A Late Life Delivery
description:
Charon: A Late Life Delivery is a single player story based game.

You play as a new soul who has just entered the after life. Unfortunately, they lost their papers needed to determine their newfound fate. Forcing them to take on the task as food-courier, in hopes of finding their scattered papers across the afterlife. While delivering food and messages from the living to their rightful deceased customers.

Explore the vast abstract depiction of the after life and encounter folks with meaningful stories. Play your way as you uncover bits and bits of our main character's mysterious past as you gather their papers.

Controls:
  • [M] to pause and open menu (Not currently working)
  • [WASD] or [←↑↓→] for movement
  • [E] to interact
  • [Q] to open inventory
  • Hold [SHIFT] to objectives and progress tracker
A Pyroxene Labs production
  • Agnes Nam
  • Nicholas Luu
  • Tristan Donders-Renaud
  • Zaid Baig
